messages.subject: military unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Due to the increased concern and topic of conversations on this (and other) list, I have started a new group for families with members serving in the military.
messages.messageBody:
Due to the increased concern and topic of conversations on this (and other)
list, I have started a new group for families with members serving in the
military. Here is the description:

"This is a place for unschoolers with family members in the military and for
those that support them. It is a place to connect and complain, commiserate
and celebrate.

I hope this is a short-lived list and that all our families are safe and
together again soon. "

Please don't join if you have a need to push one agenda or another.

Group name: MilitaryUnschoolers
Group home page: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/MilitaryUnschoolers
Group email address: MilitaryUnschoolers@yahoogroups.com

~Kelly
